description.value:
This intricately carved wooden staff is warm to the touch and thrums with inner energy. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify abjuration magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Alarm]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Feather Fall]{Feather Fall}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Endure Elements]{Endure Elements}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]{Resist Energy}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Alarm]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Glyph of Warding]{Glyph of Warding}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dimensional Anchor]{Dimensional Anchor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]{Resist Energy}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Banishment]{Banishment}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Endure Elements]{Endure Elements}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Repulsion]{Repulsion}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
